name: Midas' Golden Hell
description:
After transforming the people of his kingdom into gold, Midas is send to a place that changes between Real World and Dream World, with only being able to use his power on himself. 

Traverse through puzzles and find your way back to reality!

This game was made for April Fools Day Jam 

CREDITS

• Created by Musi

• Art by Musi and Kira

• Sounds taken from freesound.org

• Musics taken from opengameart.com
